DESCRIPTIONS.MEMORIZATION_UNIT: How much do you want to memorize per day?
DESCRIPTIONS.START_UNIT: Where do you want to start memorizing from?
DESCRIPTIONS.END_UNIT: Where do you want to end?
DESCRIPTIONS.MEMORIZATION_DAYS_PER_CYCLE: How many days do you want to memorize per cycle?

DESCRIPTIONS.FULL_PLAN: Here is a preview of your plan! If you like it you can now generate the full plan
